pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Live Colour Ultra Brights Magnetic Purple
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Schwarzkopf Live Colour Ultra Brights Magnetic Purple semi-permanent colour adds maximum intensity & vibrancy with built in electrifying pigments, lasts for 8 washes and contains no ammonia.

LIVE Colour Ultra Brights - a range of bright and bold colours with built-in electrifying pigments for maximum intensity and vibrancy!

Change your hair colour as often as you like with Schwarzkopf LIVE Colour Ultra Brights!

Gentle Conditioning Colour:

- Enriched with a colour mask that adds superior condition and shine.

- Gentle formula contains no peroxide or ammonia.

- Will not lighten hair.

- Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes.

Ultra Bright Magnetic Purple semi-permanent colour adds condition and vivid shine with bright, vibrant colour results.

Suitable For: Shimmering highlights or vibrant all over colour.

Boxed Contents: 30mL sachet of colour, instruction leaflet, gloves.

Size: 1 Pack

Hair Colour: Purple

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to the accompanying directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If in eyes, wash out immediately with water.

Ingredients

Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Disodium Cocoamphodipropionate, Methylparaben, Parfum, Polyquaternium-6, Propylparaben, HC Blue No. 16, Basic Violet 2, Ethanolamine, Etidronic Acid.

Directions

Quick & Easy to Apply:
- Shampoo and towel dry hair.
- Apply colour and leave on for 5 to 30 minutes.
- Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.
- For long or thick hair we recommend using two or more packs.

One Application:
- Instruction leaflet & gloves enclosed.

Directions for use: See package insert.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
